duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as the primary interface for TbV Tier 2 Master Agents and develop relationships with them, translating their feedback and concerns internally.
Identify opportunities and lead account strategy and planning discussions with Master Agents to drive distribution growth strategy for TbV Retail.
Work closely with channel leadership in the consumer experience, sales, and analytics organizations to drive and manage distribution growth of accounts.
Produce and present creative, compelling proposals, presentations, and business reviews that express Total by Verizon's key initiatives and expectations from a distribution and growth perspective.
Assess performance of each agent and retailer, and develop a tailored plan on a monthly basis to improve productivity and meet targets.
Measure and monitor Key Performance Indicators for respective Indirect Partners, developing and executing plans to exceed sales targets.
Make critical, business-impacting decisions, share best practices, and ensure results and KPIs are being met to drive and execute performance.
Proactively cultivate collaboration and ensure successful prioritization and management of multiple accounts, programs, and responsibilities.
Drive and influence Master Agent distribution growth strategy for TbV Retail.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or four or more years of work experience, with at least two years of Indirect channel experience. An MBA, or an M.S. in related fields, and exceptional PP/Google Slide creation for executive presentations is preferred. Project management experience is also desirable.
